author: Josh Gerstein
title: Judge orders transfer or release for some inmates at virus-wracked Ohio federal prison
description: But another court refuses to act as “super-warden” for hard-hit U.S. prison complex in Louisiana.
content: But with fewer than 100 of the 2400 inmates at Elkton tested, the actual infection rate may be much higher, the judge said, calling the lack of testing at the prison a debacle especially compared with a nearby state prison that has conducted thousands of test… [+4734 chars]
